product_name: Nite Ize CamJam Tie Down Strap - 6 ft.
long_description: Designed with smart features for ease of use, the 6 ft. Nite Ize CamJam Tie Down Strap will be the cam strap you reach for when securing heavy loads for transport. High density weave polypropylene 1 in. wide strap is securely attached to a sturdy, cast zinc alloy cam mechanism. Non-slip buckle on the cam not only latches securely, but it can also gradually release even under high tension, eliminating sudden and dangerous unloading. Can be configured in a basic fixed loop configuration or a special "lockout" configuration for heavy loads. Webbing strap features an angled end for easy threading and intuitive operation in any configuration. Sewn-in, color coded and numerically labeled tags allows for easy identification of strap length. Features a working load limit of 700 lbs. and break strength of 2,100 lbs.
short_description: Designed with smart features for ease of use, the 6 ft. Nite Ize CamJam Tie Down Strap will be the cam strap you reach for when securing heavy loads for transport.
